creator: donovan@lucidity.ca
text:
When going to my Apache to a directory without an index file, Apache lists the
files, and then adds:

Apache/1.3.27 Server at lucidity.homeip.net Port 80

Apache is running off port 64738, however.

creator: slive@apache.org
text:
What is your setting for the following directives?
Listen
Port
UseCanonicalName

creator: donovan@lucidity.ca
text:
How embarrassing.

The Listen was 64738, however, my recent attempts to use 2.0 and then reverting 
back means I neglected to change the Port variable, which was at the default of 
80.

Correcting this variable corrected the output as one would expect.  Thank you :)
